department.ch: 學習與教學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程主要目的在強化博士班同學對教育統計學之知識，並培養同學運用各類統計方法，進行各種量化研究，以回答研究問題。因此，本課程除了統計知識，更著動同學在實務資料分析的養成。課程主題暫訂為平均數檢定、變異數分析、迴歸分析、信度、因素分析及結構方程模式，並視同學研究問題的需要而有所調整。課程進行包含理論講述及資料分析實作(EXCEL、JASP)，以期奠定同學進行量化研究能力。
goal.en: The main purpose of this course is to strengthen the ability of the quantitative research for the doctoral students, and to help students to actually execute quantitative research. Course topics include the basic concepts of inferential statistics, including probability distributions and hypothesis testing. Additionally, the subjects also include advanced statistical concepts, including analysis of variance, multiple regression analysis, item reliability, factor analysis and structural equation modeling. The way of this course includes narration and operation (Excel, SPSS, JASP) in order to build students' abilities in statistical theory and practice.

outline.ch: 教學進度與主題週次日期課程內容19/14統計學回顧：抽樣分配與區間估計29/21兩平均數差異檢定39/28實作：平均數差異檢定 ；單因子變異數分析410/5單因子變異數分析；二因子變異數分析510/12重複測量與混合設計610/19實作：變異數分析710/26共變、相關與簡單迴歸811/2多元迴歸、中介與調節效果911/9實作：相關與迴歸分析1011/16 (運動會停課)1111/23試題分析、測驗信度1211/30效度、因素分析1312/7實作：試題分析、信度與因素分析1412/14結構方程模式導論、驗證性因素分析1512/21模式適配指標1612/28實作：結構方程模式171/4口頭報告181/11期末報告繳交
outline.en: Review what you should known：Sampling distribution and hypothesis testingTest for two means differenceOperating： Differences in means; One-way ANOVATwo-way ANOVA and the interaction effectsANOVA：Repeat measure and mixed modelOperating：ANOVACorrelation and regression analysisMultiple regression analysis, mediation and moderation effectsOperating：correlation and regression analysisDay OFFItem analysis, reliabilityExplornary factor  analysis (EFA)Operating：Item analysis and EFAConfirmatory factor  analysis and Structural equation modeling (1)Structural equation modeling (2)Operating：Structural equation modelingOral reportDue of the Final report

textbook.ch: Kline, R. B. (2016). Principles and Practice of Structural Equation Modeling (4th ed.). New York, NY: The Guilford Press.Navarro, D.J., Foxcroft, D.R., & Faulkenberry, T.J. (2019). Learning Statistics with JASP: A Tutorial for Psychology Students and Other Beginners.王文中、錢才瑋 (2012)。統計學與Excel資料分析之實習應用(第六版)。台北：博碩。
textbook.en: Kline, R. B. (2016). Principles and Practice of Structural Equation Modeling (4th ed.). New York, NY: The Guilford Press.Navarro, D.J., Foxcroft, D.R., & Faulkenberry, T.J. (2019). Learning Statistics with JASP: A Tutorial for Psychology Students and Other Beginners.王文中、錢才瑋 (2012)。統計學與Excel資料分析之實習應用(第六版)。台北：博碩。

gradMethod.ch: 1). 課堂參與 20%    2). 回家作業 40%  3). 期末口頭報告 10%  4). 期末報告 30%
